step.datasource: select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, o.debnr, CASE WHEN refer1 IS NOT NULL AND refer2 IS NOT NULL THEN LEFT(refer1 + ' | ' + refer2,20) ELSE ISNULL(refer1,'') + ISNULL(refer2,'') END AS refer from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr where afgehandld = 0 AND ( c.YesNofield4 = 1 ) AND ( c.YesNofield5 = 1 ) and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') order by ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, MIN(r.id) as id from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr where afgehandld = 0 AND ( c.YesNofield4 = 1 ) AND ( c.YesNofield5 = 1 ) and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') group by o.ordernr order by ordernr
step.stepname: Update refer CAT EDI ORDERS - rows

step.datasource: select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, o.debnr, CASE WHEN refer1 IS NOT NULL AND refer2 IS NOT NULL THEN LEFT(refer1 + ' | ' + refer2,20) ELSE ISNULL(refer1,'') + ISNULL(refer2,'') END AS refer from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr where afgehandld = 0 AND ( c.YesNofield4 = 1 ) AND ( c.YesNofield5 = 1 ) and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') order by ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, MIN(r.id) as id from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on c.debnr = o.debnr where afgehandld = 0 AND ( c.YesNofield4 = 1 ) AND ( c.YesNofield5 = 1 ) and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') group by o.ordernr order by ordernr
step.stepname: Update refer CAT EDI ORDERS - rows

step.datasource: select TOP 100 PERCENT ordernr as headerid, ordernr, debnr, CASE WHEN refer1 IS NOT NULL AND refer2 IS NOT NULL THEN refer1 + ' | ' + RIGHT(refer2, 17 - LEN(refer1)) ELSE ISNULL(refer1,'') + ISNULL(refer2,'') END AS refer from orkrg with (NOLOCK) where afgehandld = 0 and debnr in ('040447','040448', '974605', '975195') and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') order by ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, MIN(r.id) as id from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr where o.afgehandld = 0 and o.debnr in ('040447','040448', '974605', '975195') and ( ISNULL(refer,'') = '' ) and (ISNULL(refer1,'') != '' OR ISNULL(refer2,'') != '') group by o.ordernr order by o.ordernr
step.stepname: Update refer DAF EDI ORDERS - rows
